Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5Q69PI8jdQVkb1ZT]{Cavalier Dedication}

Requirements You are riding your mount.

You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal} to order your mount to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Stride} twice. At any point during this movement, you can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} one enemy within reach or within the first range increment of a ranged weapon. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll.
